item.title: 5.3.1 Introduction
item.description: ‚ùó Only vehicles fitted with temperature sensors have data. Temperature Report to output the instrument’s engine temperature control report. üëâ More temperature sensors here

item.title: 5.3.2 Chart
item.description: Chart # If the user wants to see Temperature Report do the following: Click on Reports > Temperature > Chart. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see the temperature chart report. Sensor: Select one of the temperature sensor names that corresponds to the number plate you just selected.

item.title: 5.3.3 Detail
item.description: Temperature detail # Detailed report: Is to filter the temperature value change points. If the user wants to see Detailed Temperature Report do the following: Click on Report > Temperature > Detail. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Number plate: Select a number plate you want to see the temperature chart report.

item.title: 5.3.4 Detail Adv
item.description: Report temperature detail ADV # Advanced temperature report: Filter to get data according to the time the user wants in any interval 1 time. If user wants to see Report temperature detail ADV do the following: Click on Report > Temperature > Detail ADV. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time.
